aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.intro: Hello and welcome to my website! I am a passionate frontend developer from Munich who loves creating creative and user-friendly digital experiences. I am delighted that you are here to learn more about me and my work.
aboutMe.softSkill_1: Creativity and Problem Solving, along with Attention to Detail and Structure: I enjoy finding innovative solutions that are both aesthetically pleasing and functional. Through working on numerous projects, I have been able to take on new challenges daily and develop creative approaches. My logical understanding and disciplined work ethic enable me to efficiently solve complex problems. I place great importance on clean and organized code that is easy to maintain and expand.
aboutMe.softSkill_2: Teamwork, Communication, as well as Customer Orientation and Goal Orientation: I enjoy working in a team and value the exchange of ideas and feedback. Good communication is key to successful projects and satisfied clients. Your satisfaction is my top priority. I strive to bring your vision to life and exceed your expectations. I always take a goal-oriented approach to achieve optimal results.
aboutMe.ending: Feel free to review a selection of my projects to get an impression of my work. I look forward to collaborating with you on exciting projects!

mySkills.title: My skills
mySkills.intro: I have grown my frontend developments skills that have allowed me to create different real projects.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.intro: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
portfolio.decription_join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
